Brotherly reconcilement preached in Oxford for the vnion of some, and now published with larger meditations for the vnitie of all in this Church and common-wealth: with an apologie of the vse of fathers, and secular learning in sermons. By Egeon Askevv of Queens Colledge. Askew, Egeon, b. 1576.
[14], 353, [3] p.
Printed [by R. Field] for George Bishop, London : 1605.
Printer's name from STC. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
